messages.title: Only I can beat the Conservatives here
messages.content: Angela Smith says 'The election here in Altrincham and Sale West is between me and the Conservative candidate. Just look at the result here last time.'

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Stop Brexit from damaging jobs and opportunity in Trafford.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Fighting for more money for schools
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Fighting for more money for all of our local schools.
Having an office available for constituents to visit their MP.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The election here in Altrincham and Sale West is between me [Angela Smith] and the Conservative candidate.

issues.brexitEurope: Stop Brexit from damaging jobs and opportunity in Trafford.
issues.education: Fighting for more money for all of our local schools.

leaflet.personalStatement: "I hope people make their vote count this time and back an MP Trafford can be proud of."

images.caption: Leaflet image with Angela Smith's three-step plan for Altrincham and Sale West, her statement regarding the competition with the Conservative candidate, and the results from a previous election.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet includes previous election results indicating a tactical voting situation: 'Lib Dem 31%' and 'Con & Brexit 32%' with 'Lab 12%'.
